title: Free to be, you and me
creator_credit: Murakami-Wolf Productions, Marlo Thomas, Carole Hart and Bill Davis
brief_description: A special program designed for a more structural approach to exploration of personal development concepts. Includes an all star cast from stage and screen, presenting in live action, animation and puppetry two thematically designed units: Friendship and co-operation; Expectations and independence. Features Alan Alda, Harry Belafonte, Mel Brooks, Rita Coolidge, Billy the Wolfe, Roberta Flack, Michael Jackson, Kris Kristofferson, Bobby Morse, The New Seekers, Tom Smothers, Cecily Tyson, The Voices ofo East Harlem and Dionne Warwick.
